profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Precise Tile and Contracting Inc is a tile installation company located in Stouffville, Ontario, and has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 25 years. We are committed to providing top quality tile installation services at competitive pricing.
 
Precise Tile and Contracting tile installation services include tile flooring, backsplashes, shower stalls, entryways, fireplaces, accent walls, and other custom tile design.  Majority of the areas we assist in include but are not limited to kitchens, bathroom and shower tiling, entryway, sunroom, and the basement of your residence. We also offer tile installation in the greater Toronto area for commercial and retail spaces such as restaurants, retail stores, commercial offices, and many other commercial and retail businesses.
 
Precise Tile offers professional tile installation services for ceramic, porcelain, slate, marble, granite, glass tile, stainless steel, bamboo, and many more.  Whether it’s mosaic tile, subway tile or you are looking for a pattern design within your tiles, Precise Tile is your best choice for tile installation.

Call us for a free quote today at 416-999-8453!

profile:
Fast, efficient, and honest, TOP Renovation has become a reputable home renovation company. Our team is up for every job, managing projects with the skill and experience our clients have come to expect.

TOP Renovation offers a wide range of renovation options from kitchen, bathroom, basement, whole house, painting and flooring. We work closely with customers to develop their ideal home renovation. We want our customers to be satisfied with our work, which is why we provide open communication channels throughout the duration of each project.

TOP Renovation has gained a solid reputation in GTA area and maintains an A+ rating with most of our clients. We encourage you to check our current standing! We strive to provide complete satisfaction to our customers, which provides consistent referrals for new work.

Our beautiful showroom provides access to the most populous selection of tiles, floorings, lights, walls, handrails, woodboards and other accessories from famous brands, feel free to contact us today and make an appointment.

profile:
Landschaft is a Toronto-based company with one goal in mind – to provide a high-level unique landscape services at an affordable price.
 
We cover all aspects of your outdoor space:
- Interlocking
- Concrete Paving
- Retaining walls
- Landscaping
- Wood/composite decks
 
We design and build low impact and low maintenance landscapes in GTA. With Landschaft services you will spend less time taking care of your yard and more time enjoying it.
 
Our company has grown its reputation as innovative and responsible team that is always ensure needs of our clients and provide excellent services.
 
Landschaft is a company built on a solid construction knowledge and experience over the years
 
Landscaping is what we are good at!

profile:
Miranda Tile is a family owned and operated company located in Holland Landing, Ontario.

We specialize in bathrooms, floors and any project that requires porcelain or stone tiles. At Miranda Tile, our goal is to provide quality workmanship, on time and provide the best customer service to our York Region customers.

Quality and Customer Service does not happen by accident. It takes commitment, organization and constant training. We strive to consistently improve our services in an effort to satisfy each and every customer. When we see a big smile on our customer's face at the end of each job, that‘s the best reward for us.

Your complete satisfaction will always be our priority.

profile:
Hello! I've been in the construction business for over 20 years. My specialiaty is in large format tiles.
Bathroom and fireplace is my favourite.
I also have special tools to cut and install slabs.
The slabs sizes usually comes over 8 feet by 4 feet, 10 feet by 5 feet, which you have to have special tools to cut and also install.
I don't just install tiles or stones, I also prepare the job before installation and demolition of old materials.
Before tiling we do drypack in the bathroom and also put Derta on the floor where the plywoods are.
So besides tiling we provide drypack, Detra, waterproofing (which is important for steam showers).
I can go to any area for business from Downtown Toronto all the way to Collingwood and from Mississauga all the way to Port Perry or end East.

Give 416-400-6061 a call today. I look forward to hearing from you!

profile: Masterbuild windows and doors established in 1999 in toronto  . We provide professional instalation services on windows and doors replacement all across  GTA   .  Which includes building bay windows ,  brick  and concrete cut outs ,   aluminum glass enclosures , European tilt and turn windows , comertial windows and doors , garage doors , interior doors. multiple windows styles and glass options , triple glass with LowE glass and argon gas , foam field vinyl windows frames and more . All types and styles  of exterior doors  from steel and fiberglass doors to a solid wood doors with any style of stained glass designs  or wrought iron Disign finished any colour , with  any type of trim  and with hundreds of hardware choices to choose from   . Our locally  manufactured windows and doors all comes with highest energy ratings in canada . And all been tested for wind , water , heat , cold and pressure by energy star  . All of our windows and doors are installed by our in house friendly licensed insured and certified installers  with minimum of 15 years experience in a trade and compliments by a life time warranty  , one of the best warranties on the market  today . We provide a free no obligation in home professional  consultations or a tour at our showroom  . We have thousands of Successfully completed projects across ontario in the last over 20 years with thousands of  satisfied home owners . Call  us now to get best results , guaranteed energy savings and a pleasant windows and doors replacement experience .

profile:
We have more than 15 years of experience in painting. But experience alone is not enough to do a great painting job. We believe quality matters and at EverLast painters our focus is quality and not quantity. We think we have come up with a recipe that will enforce our ideology of quality before quantity. Here are some of the reasons of why you should consider EverLast painter for your next painting project.
 
*We never hire sub-contractors. Unlike some of the big players who sit in the office and resale the projects that they get to the lowest bidder (sub-contractors), we are on the job’s working hard to make sure the jobs do meet our high standards.
 
*We don’t use cheap paints. For our residential clients we normally use top of the line Benjamin Moore paints. Unless clients asks us otherwise.
 
*We do all of the prep work before painting, unlike many of the other guys who do the prep and painting all at once we do all of the prep work first. We believe in our quality workmanship and have nothing to hide. We want the customer to see how well of a prep work we have done, after all prep work is the foundation of every painting. If it’s not done right                  no matter what material is used the painting simply will not last long.

profile: Krush Tile & Stone is built on integrity, knowledge, and commitment. With over 60 years of combines knowledge spread between 3 tile setters, you're in good hands. KTS is located in Aurora, Ontario and specializes in the installation of large format tile, main floor renovation as well as shower and tub surround installations. Our company uses only the best building materials on the market, with 25 Year warranties being the standard for all of our wet areas. We look forward to guiding you through the renovation process with our knowledgeable team.
service_area: York Region, Simcoe County, Markham, Peel, Toronto, Durham
products:
Krush Tile installs tiles with zero lipage, perfectly flat ( lipage is the height between tiles,)
Proper knowledge on installation of rectified Porcelain, Marble, Granite, Travertine, Quartz, Glass
NuHeat - In floor heating in floor available in 120 volt or 240 volt - installed by a Nuheat certified installer with licensed electricians hooking up power & thermostat
Floor Levelling using Drypak by one of our companies cement finishers
services:

1/32th grout joints
Backsplashes at Top Tile all of our Back splash installations include high end setting materials. We use better materials because we want to provide our clients with only the best. 


We also have other trades availible that we have hand picked to work with in our renovations and all are experts in their trade, no jack of all trades. If any trade requires permits we have them pulled and is all included in the price.
